resources.string:
This will erase all the data on your phone’s internal storage", including:
"
Your account" "
System and app data and settings" "
Downloaded apps
All personal information and downloaded apps will be erased, and this action cannot be undone!
Based on the gravity sensor, the interface changes state to make single hand use easier.
If you forget your screen unlock password, you can unlock the screen by logging into your Letv account.
Number-only passwords must be longer than %s digits.
Soft: protects eyes, suitable for long-time phone use
Use Internet time zone and time
When connecting to Wi-Fi P2P or Bluetooth devices, people nearby will be able to see the name of your phone.
Access notification bar when password is locked
Show lockscreen interface based on gravity sensor
"Wake up your phone by saying 'Hi, Xiao Le'"
Slide down to turn on flashlight
Adjust the size and distribution of content displayed on the screen
Select different screen display color styles
You must reboot your phone to switch scale modes. Are you sure you want to switch?
Allow adb install commands to install apps in the background
Smart enhancement to screen color saturation and smoothness
You can scan and clear large files
When locked, the proximity sensor will be activated to avoid unintentional calls or phone usage
Draining the battery in the background. Please close when not in use.
%d app(s) are draining the battery in the background
Please close when not in use.
No high power-consuming apps in the background found
Power-consuming apps in the background found
The following apps are draining the battery. Please close them when not in use.
%s apps draining the battery in the background are cleared
Auto enable on low battery level
Dynamically control features such as vibration and network sync based on the scenario
Limit features such as dynamic visual effects and network access
Only basic apps such as calling and messaging are kept on, while network is disabled
Enabling it allows for more precise positioning but increases battery usage
Letv account verification is required for phone resetting. Please enter your account password.

"You can use a fingerprint to unlock the screen quickly. In order to protect your privacy, the fingerprint unlock feature can only be used when the unlock method is set to \"simple password\" or \"complex password\". "
Place your finger on the fingerprint reader on the back of the phone, and lift it when you feel the vibration and place it again.
The fingerprint already exists, please try another finger.
The fingerprint unlock feature can only be used when the unlock method is set to \"PIN\" or \"Password\".
In camera screen, press and hold the fingerprint sensor to take photos or capture videos.
Place your finger on the fingerprint reader on the back of the phone.
Place your finger on the fingerprint reader and lift it when you feel the vibration.
You haven’t added any fingerprints. Add one now?
Repeatedly lift and place your finger on designated area for completion
The Back key is on the right by default and on the left in left-hand mode
The WeChat app is not installed. Please install it before enabling the alternate account
WeChat Avatar is enabled. Tap to launch the app
Allow you to log into two accounts in different versions of the same app installed
Unable to search with the screen locked
Battery is below 20%. Please charge and retry to restore to factory settings.
Connecting to Wi-Fi can help you set up your phone better
启用后会切换为静音模式
When enabled, the virtual button on bottom left will be changed to Back, while the one on bottom right to Multitask.
"After enabling, once you reach the data limit, the system will disable your data connection"
Data connection must be enabled for the portable Wi-Fi hotspot to work properly.
Wireless display is connecting, please disconnect and reconnect!
Connect to display wirelessly and display images
Please hold the switch to create a new VPN
There are illegal characters in the password, please check and retry.
Please press the WPS button on the router.
WPS connection unsuccessful, please try again.
Display custom text on lock screen
A new day should begin with something positive!
Combination of at least four characters
"The device manager doesn't allow using recently used simple passwords."
If you enable this option, make sure that Bluetooth tethering is enabled on the personal hotspot
To improve app’s location accuracy, Google and other apps may scan for nearby networks even when Wi-Fi is off. If you don’t want this to happen, go to: Advanced > Scanning always available
To see available networks turn on Wi-Fi.
Your connection(s) with %1$s device(s) will also be interrupted.
You must unmount the SD card to safely remove it
Erase all data from SD card, such as music and photos
You can transfer and manage files on the device with a computer
You can transfer pictures with a computer, and transfer any files with a computer that doesn’t support MTP
You are currently signed into these accounts:
Two passwords don’t match. Please retry!
"If you enable %1$s, your device won't be able to use screen lock to enhance data encryption."
"Because you've enabled an accessibility service, your device won't be able to use screen lock to enhance data encryption."
No services installed. Please go to apps store to download printing plug-ins.
Priority app notifications will be displayed on top
If you unmount the UICC storage, some apps you are using will stop and may be unavailable until you remount the UICC storage.
If you unmount the USB storage, some apps you are using will stop and may be unavailable until you remount the USB storage.
"Couldn't unmount UICC storage. Try again later."
"Couldn't unmount USB storage. Try again later."
Device is in Charging mode, USB debugging is disabled
Put device into QuickBoot mode instead of normal power off
External storage has been turned off
External storage has been turned on
Headphones are required for Hifi effect
This will take around 10 seconds. Please wait...
Switch to card %1$s for data usage soon.
Please first unmount the UICC storage device before removing it safely
Erases all data on the UICC storage, such as music and photos
Insert an UICC storage for mounting
Erase UICC storage device? If you do so, you will lose “ ”all" data stored there! "
"Erase the UICC storage device (this operation will delete all files stored there)? Warning: This operation can't be undone!"
You need to draw your unlock pattern to confirm that you want to erase the UICC storage.
Erases all data on the UICC storage
Charge the phone when connected to a computer
Please first unmount USB storage devices before removing them
Erases all data on the USB storage, such as music and photos
Insert an USB storage for mounting
Erase USB storage device? If you do so, you will lose “ ”all" data stored there! "
"Erase USB storage (this operation will delete all files stored there)? Warning: This operation can't be undone!"
You need to draw your unlock pattern to confirm that you want to erase the USB storage.
Erases all data on the USB storage
Allow you to transfer media files in SD card on computer
The SD card and internal storage do not have the AS certificate, please check it!
Format of AS certificate is wrong! Please install the right AS certificate
Please input the AS certificate name
Please input the other directory name, this one does exist
Please input the directory name which you want to create!
The SD card and internal storage do not have the user certificate, please check it!
Format of user certificate is wrong! Please install the right user certificate
Please input the user certificate name
Certificates Not Installed! Please Install the Certificates and try Connecting
The network password you typed is incorrect. Please try again.
Name must contain at least one character
You can add 6 custom scenes at most
Deliver high quality music over Bluetooth
Lossless Bluetooth mode may affect Wi-Fi performance. Enable now?
Use phone speaker for system sounds
Play media at the loudest possible volume
Unable to find devices that support Lossless Bluetooth
Unable to find certificate for current access point
Please disable flight mode to use EAP-SIM/AKA
Please insert SIM card to use EAP-SIM/AKA
Please select SIM card slot to use EAP-SIM/AKA
While Wi-Fi is enabled, automatically connect to the network with the best connection
Reset network name, encryption type and password (WPS parameters will be restored to factory settings)
Speed may vary on different devices such as phones or computers.
WPS connection failed. Please try again.
Select to view Beam share history
Read from or write to tag
To view available secure elements, please enable card emulation.
SIM1 and SIM2 do not support card emulation.
Google Wallet and credit cards use this feature for touch payment
Auto connect to Wi-Fi access points using passpoint
Other devices may detect this device
How can I exit the cast menu?
"Press your screen for %s seconds to exit from another device's screen cast."
Unable to unmount SD card while transferring files
Unable to format SD card while transferring files
Unmounting this USB storage device may cause some apps to stop running and render them unusable until the USB storage device is reconnected.
Unable to unmount USB storage device. Please try again.
System will unmount this USB storage device.
Please first unmount USB storage devices before removing them
Insert the USB storage device you want to mount
Recommended for XP systems. Set phone to USB mode to copy files.
Disable other USB functions to speed up charging and reduce power consumption
Install APK from phone storage and SD card
Act as a CD, including commonly used software.
Mounting a SD card may cause some of your apps to stop running.
Automatically adjust brightness to save battery
When voice unlock fails, how would you like to unlock your device?
Apps that can be accessed without unlocking device
Data transfer speeds will be reduced.
Port values must be between 1 and 65535!
Are you sure you want to save? Changing APN default settings may affect data connection!
Allow device to exchange data with another device when screens are in contact

"Use GPS to set device time. Must wait for GPS to confirm location. Detecting location via GPS will take less than a minute.
Use GPS to set device time?"

"To set device time via GPS, GPS must be enabled and wait for your location to be confirmed. Detecting location via GPS will take less than a minute. If your GPS signal is weak, your location may not be able to be determined.
Enable GPS now and set your device's time via GPS?"
All DRM permissions on your phone will be deleted. Continue?
Select SIM card for data connection
This will take around 10 seconds. Please wait...
Tap to view or change settings.
Mobile data network cannot be used
Tap to set up data SIM card
Vibrate when a SMS/MMS is received
Change input method on notification bar
When the soft keyboard is on, you can enter input method options from the notification bar.
Effectively reduce times of phone wakeups and save battery life
Optimally reduce times of phone wakeups during the night and save battery life
Please turn off Wi-Fi and retry
You can connect up to three devices. Unable to pair with other devices now.
You can connect up to three devices. Unable to send files now.
You must turn on Wi-Fi to use wireless display. Turn on Wi-Fi?
Do not allow data card switching during calls
This can speed up USB charging. Some computer don’t support this feature. Please save your data before using it.
Type of computer to plug in
" Please select the correct computer type to speed up charging. Some computer don’t support this feature. Please save your data before using it."
No SIM card inserted, unable to view data usage
Scan the QR code to connect to the wireless network
